channel.title: CVE Feed for CODESYS -- CODESYS Control RTE (SL)
channel.description: The latest CVEs for CODESYS -- CODESYS Control RTE (SL)

item.title: CVE-2022-47384|2024-08-03T14:55:07.031Z -- codesys -- codesys%20control%20rte%20%28sl%29
item.description: An authenticated remote attacker may use a stack based out-of-bounds write vulnerability in the CmpTraceMgr Component of multiple CODESYS products in multiple versions to write data into the stack which can lead to a denial-of-service condition, memory overwriting, or remote code execution.

item.title: CVE-2022-22514|2024-08-03T03:14:55.446Z -- codesys -- codesys%20control%20rte%20%28sl%29
item.description: An authenticated, remote attacker can gain access to a dereferenced pointer contained in a request. The accesses can subsequently lead to local overwriting of memory in the CmpTraceMgr, whereby the attacker can neither gain the values read internally nor control the values to be written. If invalid memory is accessed, this results in a crash.

item.title: CVE-2022-47387|2024-08-03T14:55:07.968Z -- codesys -- codesys%20control%20rte%20%28sl%29
item.description: An authenticated remote attacker may use a stack based out-of-bounds write vulnerability in the CmpTraceMgr Component of multiple CODESYS products in multiple versions to write data into the stack which can lead to a denial-of-service condition, memory overwriting, or remote code execution.

item.title: CVE-2022-47380|2024-08-03T14:55:07.019Z -- codesys -- codesys%20control%20rte%20%28sl%29
item.description: An authenticated remote attacker may use a stack based out-of-bounds write vulnerability in multiple CODESYS products in multiple versions to write data into the stack which can lead to a denial-of-service condition, memory overwriting, or remote code execution.

item.title: CVE-2022-47390|2024-08-03T14:55:07.994Z -- codesys -- codesys%20control%20rte%20%28sl%29
item.description: An authenticated, remote attacker may use a stack based out-of-bounds write vulnerability in the CmpTraceMgr Component of multiple CODESYS products in multiple versions to write data into the stack which can lead to a denial-of-service condition, memory overwriting, or remote code execution.

item.title: CVE-2022-47389|2024-08-03T14:55:08.296Z -- codesys -- codesys%20control%20rte%20%28sl%29
item.description: An authenticated, remote attacker may use a stack based out-of-bounds write vulnerability in the CmpTraceMgr Component of multiple CODESYS products in multiple versions to write data into the stack which can lead to a denial-of-service condition, memory overwriting, or remote code execution.

item.title: CVE-2022-22516|2024-08-03T03:14:55.441Z -- codesys -- codesys%20control%20rte%20%28sl%29
item.description: The SysDrv3S driver in the CODESYS Control runtime system on Microsoft Windows allows any system user to read and write within restricted memory space.

item.title: CVE-2022-47386|2024-08-03T14:55:07.972Z -- codesys -- codesys%20control%20rte%20%28sl%29
item.description: An authenticated, remote attacker may use a stack based out-of-bounds write vulnerability in the CmpTraceMgr Component of multiple CODESYS products in multiple versions to write data into the stack which can lead to a denial-of-service condition, memory overwriting, or remote code execution.

item.title: CVE-2022-22513|2024-08-03T03:14:55.460Z -- codesys -- codesys%20control%20rte%20%28sl%29
item.description: An authenticated remote attacker can cause a null pointer dereference in the CmpSettings component of the affected CODESYS products which leads to a crash.

item.title: CVE-2022-30792|2024-08-03T07:03:38.599Z -- codesys -- codesys%20control%20rte%20%28sl%29
item.description: In CmpChannelServer of CODESYS V3 in multiple versions an uncontrolled ressource consumption allows an unauthorized attacker to block new communication channel connections. Existing connections are not affected.

item.title: CVE-2022-47393|2024-08-03T14:55:08.190Z -- codesys -- codesys%20control%20rte%20%28sl%29
item.description: An authenticated, remote attacker may use a Improper Restriction of Operations within the Bounds of a Memory Buffer vulnerability in multiple versions of multiple CODESYS products to force a denial-of-service situation.

item.title: CVE-2022-22517|2024-08-03T03:14:55.454Z -- codesys -- codesys%20control%20rte%20%28sl%29
item.description: An unauthenticated, remote attacker can disrupt existing communication channels between CODESYS products by guessing a valid channel ID and injecting packets. This results in the communication channel to be closed.

item.title: CVE-2022-47392|2024-08-03T14:55:07.701Z -- codesys -- codesys%20control%20rte%20%28sl%29
item.description: An authenticated, remote attacker may use a improper input validation vulnerability in the CmpApp/CmpAppBP/CmpAppForce Components of multiple CODESYS products in multiple versions to read from an invalid address which can lead to a denial-of-service condition.

item.title: CVE-2022-47379|2024-08-03T14:55:07.032Z -- codesys -- codesys%20control%20rte%20%28sl%29
item.description: An authenticated, remote attacker may use a out-of-bounds write vulnerability in multiple CODESYS products in multiple versions to write data into memory which can lead to a denial-of-service condition, memory overwriting, or remote code execution.

item.title: CVE-2022-47382|2024-08-03T14:55:07.019Z -- codesys -- codesys%20control%20rte%20%28sl%29
item.description: An authenticated remote attacker may use a stack based out-of-bounds write vulnerability in the CmpTraceMgr Component of multiple CODESYS products in multiple versions to write data into the stack which can lead to a denial-of-service condition, memory overwriting, or remote code execution.

item.title: CVE-2022-47383|2024-08-03T14:55:06.949Z -- codesys -- codesys%20control%20rte%20%28sl%29
item.description: An authenticated, remote attacker may use a stack based out-of-bounds write vulnerability in the CmpTraceMgr Component of multiple CODESYS products in multiple versions to write data into the stack which can lead to a denial-of-service condition, memory overwriting, or remote code execution.

item.title: CVE-2022-47388|2024-08-03T14:55:08.136Z -- codesys -- codesys%20control%20rte%20%28sl%29
item.description: An authenticated, remote attacker may use a stack based out-of-bounds write vulnerability in the CmpTraceMgr Component of multiple CODESYS products in multiple versions to write data into the stack which can lead to a denial-of-service condition, memory overwriting, or remote code execution.

item.title: CVE-2022-22519|2024-08-03T03:14:55.378Z -- codesys -- codesys%20control%20rte%20%28sl%29
item.description: A remote, unauthenticated attacker can send a specific crafted HTTP or HTTPS requests causing a buffer over-read resulting in a crash of the webserver of the CODESYS Control runtime system.

item.title: CVE-2022-22515|2024-08-03T03:14:55.437Z -- codesys -- codesys%20control%20rte%20%28sl%29
item.description: A remote, authenticated attacker could utilize the control program of the CODESYS Control runtime system to use the vulnerability in order to read and modify the configuration file(s) of the affected products.

item.title: CVE-2022-47391|2024-08-03T14:55:07.901Z -- codesys -- codesys%20control%20rte%20%28sl%29
item.description: In multiple CODESYS products in multiple versions an unauthorized, remote attacker may use a improper input validation vulnerability to read from invalid addresses leading to a denial of service.

item.title: CVE-2022-47381|2024-08-03T14:55:06.946Z -- codesys -- codesys%20control%20rte%20%28sl%29
item.description: An authenticated remote attacker may use a stack based out-of-bounds write vulnerability in multiple CODESYS products in multiple versions to write data into the stack which can lead to a denial-of-service condition, memory overwriting, or remote code execution.

item.title: CVE-2022-47378|2024-08-03T14:55:06.987Z -- codesys -- codesys%20control%20rte%20%28sl%29
item.description: Multiple CODESYS products in multiple versions are prone to a improper input validation vulnerability. An authenticated remote attacker may craft specific requests that use the vulnerability leading to a denial-of-service condition.

item.title: CVE-2022-30791|2024-08-03T07:03:38.611Z -- codesys -- codesys%20control%20rte%20%28sl%29
item.description: In CmpBlkDrvTcp of CODESYS V3 in multiple versions an uncontrolled ressource consumption allows an unauthorized attacker to block new TCP connections. Existing connections are not affected.

item.title: CVE-2022-47385|2024-08-03T14:55:07.825Z -- codesys -- codesys%20control%20rte%20%28sl%29
item.description: An authenticated, remote attacker may use a stack based out-of-bounds write vulnerability in the CmpAppForce Component of multiple CODESYS products in multiple versions to write data into the stack which can lead to a denial-of-service condition, memory overwriting, or remote code execution.
